animeTitle: Journey: Taiko Arabia Hantou de no Kiseki to Tatakai no Monogatari
otherNames: The Journey, ジャーニー 太古アラビア半島での奇跡と戦いの物語
synopsis: The Journey is a Japanese–Saudi Arabian animated film co-produced by Toei Animation and Manga Productions directed by Shizuno Koubun. The film revolves around a potter named Aws who joins a battle to defend his home city.
